title: THERAFLU
instruction: Theraflu is an over-the-counter medication that attacks symptoms of the common cold, the flu, and fever.

title: CIPROFLOXACIN
instruction: Ciprofloxacin is a broad-spectrum antibiotic which means that it's used to treat a number of bacterial infections, such as: uncomplicated urinary tract infections (UTIs).

title: Paracetamol
instruction: Paracetamol (Panadol, Calpol, Alvedon) is an analgesic and antipyretic drug that is used to temporarily relieve mild-to-moderate pain and fever. It is commonly included as an ingredient in cold and flu medications and is also used on its own.
